title: Great app but needs one more thing ...
comment: I was using Torrent Manager to remotely control my Vuze torrents but this official app seems to have more features. However, just as Torrent Manager it is missing one important feature to fulfill all my needs ... notifications. Please consider adding notifications in a future update. I 'd like to be notified when my torrents complete downloading. Will rate 5 stars when this is added. PS: The FAQ says nothing about the 'new advanced remote' menu, which is needed when you previously configured a password for remote access to Vuze. I was getting 'access denied' errors because of this and it took me half an hour before I figured out there was another menu.

title: Failed to download app
comment: Due to error 927, "Vuze Remote failed to download. (Error 927)"
Please try installing the app while you are on Wifi.  Here's a link to other solutions people have used to get away from the 927 error: http://www.winphonedroid.com/error-927-android

title: All set up and ready to go!
comment: Took only a few seconds to pair with the desktop client. No issues so far, much better than using the mobile site remote.

title: Java exception
comment: Not the app's fault but my Vuze PC client won't give me an access code with the following error: failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderExep...  So I can't use it anyway.

Can you make sure your PC client version is 5.1.0.0 (or higher)?  There may be an issue with older clients with regards to this.  Also, making sure your Java version is the latest might help.  Good Luck!

title: Force close on LG G2
comment: I'm sure it's fabulous but it is force closing on my G2 right after inputting the pairing code.
Please try v2.0.  We are optimistic that G2 owners will be able to use the remote functionality (although the search may still not work)
